job_details.Functieomschrijving:
Company Information

   Syntho is a data technology organization with a strong expertise in AI-generated synthetic data, headquartered in Amsterdam, Netherlands. It was founded in 2020 with the goal of solving the global privacy dilemma and enable the open data economy, where data can be used and shared freely and privacy guaranteed. We offer privacy-preserving synthetic data to unlock your data and take away legitimate privacy concerns.

   As a startup, Syntho has ambitious plans in the upcoming years and is growing really fast. Want to grow your career and be at the forefront of customer success innovation? Then we're looking for you!

   Role Description
     * Taking a proactive role in implementing and managing our customer service tools.
     * Assessing and implementing strategies to improve and scale Syntho's customer service operations.
     * Improving our customer service practices and customer servicetools.
     * Developing and implementing customer success metrics to improve our services.
     * Identifying and implementing new methods for improving our customer service solution.
     * Exhibiting a mindset and drive to push boundaries in customer service by continuously looking for ways and technologies (e.g. generative AI)to innovate and enhance customer service processes.

   What's in it for you
     * Work with state-of-the-art technologies and become a front-runner with the latest tools and developments in customer success.
     * Doing good - contribute to solving one of the key global challenges: the data privacy dilemma.
     * Working with a young & ambitious team.
     * Monthly team outings and weekly Friday company catch-ups and drinks.
     * An awesome startup culture of responsibility and freedom to turn your ambition into reality.
     * Exciting work atmosphere with no shortage of treats, drinks, and social events.
     * Great and easily accessible office location in Amsterdam.
     * Flexible working arrangements and working from home.

     * Experience with setting up and maintainingcustomer service tools, such as Microsoft Dynamics Customer Services, ZenDesk Support Suite, Salesforce Service Cloud, or Freshdesk.
     * Drive to push technological boundaries in customer service, bycontinously looking for ways to leverage new technologies, such as generative AI tooling (e.g. ChatGPT).
     * Experience with implementing, managing and improving customer service operations.
     * Interest in advising Syntho customers on how to optimize our solution within their operational landscape.
     * A startup mindset and ambition to work in a startup environment.
     * Bachelor's or Master's degree in Business, IT, or related fields.
     * At least 3 years working experience in customer service or success role.
     * Experience with SaaS (software as a service) solutions or B2B software solutions is a must.
     * Experience with multiple communication channels (email, chat, phone) and CRM software is a must.
     * Ability to become proficient with our solution quickly and understand our products' technical capabilities.
     * Energetic and proactive personality.
     * Professional fluency in English.

   Over het bedrijf:
   Syntho
job_details.full_text:
Customer Success Engineer

Company Information

   Syntho is a data technology organization with a strong expertise in AI-generated synthetic data, headquartered in Amsterdam, Netherlands. It was founded in 2020 with the goal of solving the global privacy dilemma and enable the open data economy, where data can be used and shared freely and privacy guaranteed. We offer privacy-preserving synthetic data to unlock your data and take away legitimate privacy concerns.

   As a startup, Syntho has ambitious plans in the upcoming years and is growing really fast. Want to grow your career and be at the forefront of customer success innovation? Then we're looking for you!

   Role Description
     * Taking a proactive role in implementing and managing our customer service tools.
     * Assessing and implementing strategies to improve and scale Syntho's customer service operations.
     * Improving our customer service practices and customer servicetools.
     * Developing and implementing customer success metrics to improve our services.
     * Identifying and implementing new methods for improving our customer service solution.
     * Exhibiting a mindset and drive to push boundaries in customer service by continuously looking for ways and technologies (e.g. generative AI)to innovate and enhance customer service processes.

   What's in it for you
     * Work with state-of-the-art technologies and become a front-runner with the latest tools and developments in customer success.
     * Doing good - contribute to solving one of the key global challenges: the data privacy dilemma.
     * Working with a young & ambitious team.
     * Monthly team outings and weekly Friday company catch-ups and drinks.
     * An awesome startup culture of responsibility and freedom to turn your ambition into reality.
     * Exciting work atmosphere with no shortage of treats, drinks, and social events.
     * Great and easily accessible office location in Amsterdam.
     * Flexible working arrangements and working from home.

     * Experience with setting up and maintainingcustomer service tools, such as Microsoft Dynamics Customer Services, ZenDesk Support Suite, Salesforce Service Cloud, or Freshdesk.
     * Drive to push technological boundaries in customer service, bycontinously looking for ways to leverage new technologies, such as generative AI tooling (e.g. ChatGPT).
     * Experience with implementing, managing and improving customer service operations.
     * Interest in advising Syntho customers on how to optimize our solution within their operational landscape.
     * A startup mindset and ambition to work in a startup environment.
     * Bachelor's or Master's degree in Business, IT, or related fields.
     * At least 3 years working experience in customer service or success role.
     * Experience with SaaS (software as a service) solutions or B2B software solutions is a must.
     * Experience with multiple communication channels (email, chat, phone) and CRM software is a must.
     * Ability to become proficient with our solution quickly and understand our products' technical capabilities.
     * Energetic and proactive personality.
     * Professional fluency in English.

   Over het bedrijf:
   Syntho

profile_classification.rationale: The job description focuses heavily on customer success, implementation of customer service tools, and improving customer service operations. While it mentions 'generative AI tooling (e.g. ChatGPT)' as a way to innovate customer service processes, this is in the context of enhancing productivity and user experience within a customer service function, rather than core development or engineering of AI models. The primary responsibilities and required experience align with a customer-facing technical support or success role, not a specialized AI engineering position. Therefore, it falls under the 'Ambiguous' category as it's primarily business-focused and uses AI tools for productivity enhancement rather than being an AI development role.
